meanings.definition: relating to or located in the concha of the ear
meanings.sent1: The conchal shape of the seashell was fascinating.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the conchal region of the ear carefully.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her conchal earrings could hear better than she could.
meanings.sent4: The conchal design of the building echoed the curves of a seashell.
meanings.sent5: The conchal pattern on the fabric reminded her of the ocean waves.

meanings.sent1: The conchal colors of the painting gave it a beachy vibe.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a conchal sculpture that looked like a seashell.
meanings.sent3: The conchal pattern on the rug made it seem like walking on sand.
meanings.sent4: Her conchal necklace shimmered like a shell in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The conchal decorations in the room transported her to a seaside retreat.
